title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Identify the specific areas of philosophy that the tool will focus on, and gather user requirements for the tool's functionality.

title: Design the User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of the tool.

title: Develop the Backend Infrastructure
description: Design and implement the backend architecture for handling user requests, data storage, and algorithm processing.

title: Implement Argument Analysis Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms for parsing, analyzing, and comparing philosophical arguments.

title: Integrate the Frontend with the Backend
description: Connect the designed user interface to the backend infrastructure for data exchange.

title: Test the Tool's Functionality
description: Perform various testing scenarios to ensure the tool is functioning correctly and efficiently.
dependencies: Integrate the Frontend with the Backend

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user guides, tutorials, and FAQs for assisting users in using the tool effectively.

title: Security Assessment and Implementation
description: Evaluate the tool's security vulnerabilities and implement necessary safeguards to protect user data.
